metadata.Plot: Left Behind finds commercial airline pilot Ray Steele (Nicholas Cage) struggling to keep his passengers calm and his plane afloat after the Biblical Rapture strikes mid-flight. Meanwhile, GWN reporter Cameron "Buck" Williams (Chad Michael Murray) becomes Ray's reluctant co-pilot, and Ray's terrified daughter Chloe (Cassi Thompson) braves the chaos of the city streets in search of her brother and mother..
metadata.Writer: Paul Lalonde, John Patus, Tim LaHaye
metadata.Actors: Nicolas Cage, Lea Thompson, Cassi Thomson
metadata.Country: United States, Canada, Japan, United Kingdom
